name: Rolling in the Dark
description:
Beyond the brave smiley face we put on everyday, can you keep rolling when the darkness closes in? 

In the darkness, you feel alone... but are you? 

Discover what lays beyond!

Game submission for the Bite Sized Horror Game Jam 2018, with theme "Beyond"  #BiteSizedHorrorJam

Hope you enjoy :)

P/S: Playing with headphones in the dark recommended, for a better experience! ;)
